storyInfo: In order to cover the Self-Salvation Corps' retreat, Amiya proposes to shut off the city defense artillery. On the way to the wall, Amiya and co once again run into Hoederer, and Feist brings out a little trick to allow Amiya and the Doctor to board the lift.

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Areas D and E have been severely damaged, and the structures in other areas have sustained various degrees of damage as well!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Nineteen people have light injuries, with nobody seriously injured as of yet.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Fortunately, we followed the instructions given by you and the Doctor, and managed to move most of them to a safe area ahead of time––
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: No, nowhere's safe right now.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Everywhere around you is dangerous... Our entire stronghold has been completely exposed to the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: They're not going to stop until they've blasted this place into smithereens to make sure we have nowhere to hide.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: How much time do we have?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Thirty minutes. Uhh, maybe even less than that.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The nearby plates are pretty old, and if we take the power of the artillery we've seen before and multiply that by the theoretical maximum output value––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We won't even have thirty minutes before the structure above us collapses right onto our heads!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Let Harmo know and we'll start the train right away.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Train?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You all should've seen it before. A few kilometers above us is a train station.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I thought all the stations were occupied by the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then all we have to do is take that one back.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Now that the Sarkaz have cut off all our pathways to other boroughs, this is the last chance we have to evacuate Sudean.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Heidi, once we leave Sudean, do you have a way to keep us out of sight?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Yes. I've been preparing for this.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Once we arrive at the next station, we'll have friends who will disguise us until we successfully enter Central Londinium.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The biggest question mark will be whether or not we can safely board the train––
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Clovisia, how far are we from the city walls?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Very close, if we take the underground passages.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I'd like to try climbing them from beneath.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, are you planning to...?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: We'll buy time for the Self-Salvation Corps to retreat.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Block all exits from the targeted plate and keep an eye on the train station. I don't want them crawling into the next gutter over.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Set up the motion-tracking ground targeting system. In case they still have some fight left in them and plan to escape through the surface via vehicle, we'll greet them with even more intense fire.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Strengthen the defenses of all points inside the city walls.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Also, change the control passwords for the defense artillery so no one but me can deactivate it.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Good, you're taking adequate precautions.
General?! You're here...?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: In a matter of moments, these pesky insects have nowhere to hide. The Londinium rebels will never again dare to poke their heads out.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: More importantly, nobody will be able to go in and out of the dark passages we cannot see. The only thing the dukes outside will hear will be our hand-picked messages.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: No one will interfere with our project's progress again.
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Manfred, am I not welcome to share this moment of triumph with you?
attributes.name: Theresis

attributes.content: Please do not mock me so, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Oh? You've gotten better than before. We hardly spoke five sentences, and you've already realized we are not Theresis.
attributes.name: Theresis?

attributes.content: Your Highness... Whether or not His Majesty is willing to turn a blind eye to you, should you draw the attention of the Confessarii, they will surely petition His Majesty to restrict your movements.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Very well. As you said, the Military Commission cannot allow two men to call the shots––
attributes.name: Theresis?

attributes.content: In that case, I'll shift to an appearance I'm more comfortable with.
How unusual that you're willing to meet with me using the same appearance you take at the Royal Court.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: We vowed not to use the faces of the dead, so as to not scare you and your men.
You came back sooner than expected.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Even though you helped us root out the rebels' den, they may still have an escape route I haven't found.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: If you could uphold your end of the deal and follow them until every last rebel has fallen into our hands...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Do you really think that Doctor can keep us hidden for so long?
More importantly, Manfred, you must not forget that we do not belong to you.
I was out of line. Please forgive me.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Don't talk to us the same way you do to old pink-eyes. We've told you before, we won't fall for that drivel.
As you wish, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Since you decided to come back ahead of time, did you find what you were looking for underground?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Hmm... That 'King of Sarkaz' is stronger than we thought, but is far from mature.
She knows little of what she is about to face. If we want to learn more about her, that will have to wait until she meets Her Majesty.
You'd better not let the Confessarii hear those words.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: And why not?
They'll think the Damazti Cluster of the Royal Court... had a change of heart.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: And why would you think that matters to us?
Manfred, we've already done what we promised you. You and the vampire can clean up the rest of the mess yourselves.
Oh, right... Next time we speak, pick an identity for us that is still alive.
Vina, Amiya and the Doctor have already left.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The first wave of Self-Salvation Corps forces are rushing towards the station above us.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Hurry, pick up the pace!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Once they capture the station, injured troops and non-combatant civilians will be the first to board the train.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Mr. Balin, can I trouble you and the medics to tend to the injured with restricted mobility? Everyone, please pay attention to the signal lights on both sides of the passage, and don't get lost!
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Most of the command structure will go with the injured and the civilians, except––
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Have all our people entered the retreat channel?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: The integrity of the superstructure is continuing to erode! Commander, we have to get out of here quick!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: As long as everyone's inside, I'll be right behind you!
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: 12th, sitrep!
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Commander, the underground areas won't hold for much longer. Are enemies really still coming down?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Report!
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Vina, should we go with Balin's group?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: We're staying.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Staying? You're going to stay here with Commander Clovisia?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I have a feeling... Maybe she's getting it too.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The strongest enemy... might not be above us right now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The cannons.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn, the defensive cannons are activating again! This time, they're targeting the plate closest to the city walls. From what I can tell, they're not aiming at us...
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: But there's no guarantee that the surrounding areas are safe.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Run, hurry––
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Where's my daughter? Has anyone seen my daughter!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Look out!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Get inside the sturdiest building as quickly as you can! ––No, get away from the city walls, now!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: O-Okay...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: So this... is Londinium's defensive artillery.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Based on the current situation, it won't be long until the cannon fire penetrates the plate and destroys the base structure.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Those damned Sarkaz... Is this the moment they've been waiting for? Are they trying to destroy the city?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: No. They've only activated a small number of cannons, and their targets are quite clear.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: They're trying to eradicate us... and our friends.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn, what should we do?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Among the soldiers who came back with us yesterday, how many of them were originally part of the city's defense forces garrisoned here?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Call them over. Bring the best equipment we've got.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Tell them–– it's time to take back these walls from the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We're almost there.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Careful, don't trip and fall––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Are you hanging in there?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: *sigh*... It's hard to say.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Yeah, I know where you're coming from.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I've also made the big mistake of trusting people I shouldn't.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: After that, for an entire month, it took everything I had to force myself to keep going.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: As soon as I stopped, I... Well, I'd feel like I couldn't look Amiya in the eye.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Well, the battle's not over yet.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: People don't have enough time to catch their breaths. It'd be too much of a luxury for me to mourn or wallow in self-doubt.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Mr. Feist, do you need help? I can calm you down.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How? Is that some sort of Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Something like that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So... do you also help your men with psychological treatment, under normal circumstances?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: If the operator thinks it's necessary.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Mr. Feist, did I come off the wrong way?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, no, that's not it. I was just thinking you have some truly amazing Arts.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Even in a big place like Londinium, I've hardly seen anything like them before.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Miss Amiya, I appreciate your kindness. But, I don't think I'm ready to drive that scene out of my head so quickly.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Then we'll just have to get right back to work.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Let's do it.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The drones are showing that the defense structure layer above us is... very thick.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Can it be blown up?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not likely. If Londinium's defenses could get blown up so easily... Well, let's just say, we would've stormed the Shard yesterday.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I appreciate that, Doctor. You sure know how to twist your employees' arms.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hmm... I've finished scanning the lift, and as long as you guys can open up enough of a gap for me to push the drone through, I should be able to hack into the lift and take control of it.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Of course, you'll have to find a bigger gap to get yourselves up first.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, don't you think you should send a signal and call Misery over?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Fine, I guess we'll have to do it ourselves.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Maybe the locals over here can give me some inspiration.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If you can locate the support structure and apply an extremely strong external force, you might be able to open a little seam...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Someone's rapidly approaching our location!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Did the Sarkaz expect us to find a way to climb up the wall?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who cares about that? I'll have the drone pack some Originium explosives!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Feist, calculate the position. I'll think of some way to amplify the explosive effect––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: He's here!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ....Hoederer.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We meet again, leader of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: What happened to W...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you sure you should be worrying about her right now? I heard you folks were short on time.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I'm willing to set aside whatever happened between you two. As well as... what happened at Chernobog, with Scout...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, Mr. Mercenary, if you intend on standing in our way, I'll cut you down without mercy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: For any mercenary, dying at the hands of Her Majesty's heir would be a great honor.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You'd better hurry up, Amiya!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The bomb I planted just started ticking down––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: One minute! That's all the time we've got!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'll stop Hoederer...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No... Miss Amiya, let me handle this mercenary.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Mr. Feist?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've found the support column. Plus, I have a plan, though I don't know how solid it is... If it works out, you and the Doctor need to seize the opportunity to get up the wall.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I know you, young warrior.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I also know that look in your eyes. The weight of everything you've lost has finally begun to set in, and you've lost your ability to trust in the soundness of your own decisions.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Lost?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Sorry, but even if I had the time, I'm not interested in a heart-to-heart with a butcher.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Over here––!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Another smoke bomb?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Even if I'm short a usable arm, your little tricks won't work on me.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Come on, Sarkaz. Give me your worst!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Let me taste your sword, your machete, whatever weapons you've got on you––
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Trying to draw me away? Not a very sensible strategy.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Empty bravado with no self-awareness isn't going to buy you any miracles.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Even if all your men were here, you wouldn't stand a chance against me.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Pretty ugly run there. Without help, you're going to bleed out soon enough.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: After all, you're just a craftsman... You and your men wave around wrenches and hammers, and hope that is enough to hold back Sarkaz blades tempered by centuries of war?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Beg the King of Sarkaz for help. Have her deal with me.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The King of Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What... are you talking about...?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Sarkaz... You're the ones who brought war to Londinium.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: This is a war between us!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Thirty seconds!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hold on tight, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Feist, I need your location––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mercenary... Are you seeing this?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Another flashy toy? Stop resisting. You can't fool me.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Sure, you're right––
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Please, one last push!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: A metal crab? A mechanical toy? What's your play here? Quit screwing around.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: No, that's the most important thing you've taken from me.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I've never fought alone...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Look, Old Bill helped me out again. It's all thanks to your paranoia, mercenary.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: My paranoia? You...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You're using my––!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ha... Haha! Do you finally get it now?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Every time you swung your blade at me... you were carving your path to defeat!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Amiya, Hoederer cut through the structural layer!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hurry, take aim! The bomb's about to blow!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Three... Two... One––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hrrgh––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's been split open! That's a big enough gap! Alright, you're up, drone––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The lift is ours now!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, let's head up!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Feist, are you hanging in there? Grab onto the zipline, and we'll head up after them––
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You're not going anywhere!
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Closure, have any more explosives?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Yeah, catch!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Thanks for the hand, mercenary.
attributes.name: Feist
